## A Dance of Fire and Ice - Game Review

Do you love music games? If yes, then **A Dance of Fire and Ice** is a must-play game for you. The game is developed by **7th Beat Games** and was released in 2019. This game stands out from other music games due to its unique gameplay and aesthetics. 

### Gameplay

In the game, the player controls a small triangle that moves around a geometric landscape. As the music plays, different shapes and obstacles will come toward the triangle. Players must hit the correct shape at the correct time to keep moving forward. The game has simple controls: left click to jump and right click to dash. The difficulty level of the game gradually increases as the player moves forward. 

One of the unique aspects of the game is that there is no predetermined path that the player must follow. Instead, they can choose their own path by bouncing off shapes and obstacles. 

### Aesthetics

The game's aesthetics are mesmerizingly beautiful. The game's concept art and visual design are inspired by low poly and minimalistic designs. The game features backgrounds and environments with soothing color schemes that change to the rhythm of the music. The shapes and obstacles also move and transform based on the beat of the music. 

### Music 

The music in the game is excellent, and it's an integral part of the gameplay. The soundtrack includes EDM, Dubstep, and Chillstep genres. The game includes eight soundtracks, and each one is unique and memorable. 

### Final Words 

A Dance of Fire and Ice is a game that is not only enjoyable but also helps to relax the mind. Players can easily lose themselves in the game's world and enjoy the excellent music that complements it. The game is available on Steam for PC and is priced at $3.99. 

If you're a fan of music games, then A Dance of Fire and Ice is one game that shouldn't be missed. So, go on and give it a try. You'll absolutely love it.
